description: Megumi`s suspicions are raised one day when she nearly discovers Mami transforming back into Yuu. To determine if Yuu is really Mami, Megumi locks Yuu up in the storeroom, and Yuu has to figure out a way to escape before she has to appear on film. Luckily, Toshio, who has come to see Mami, manages to set her free just in time for her to transform and get on stage. Megumi rushes back to check -- Yuu has to sneak back in time!

titles.title: あぶない!? マミの秘密!
